channel.title: Screenshots?
channel.description: How do i add like a screenshot button to a client? so it takes a screenshot and it go into screenshot folder? and make a jar client? which when you download comes with cache, and run.bat? when i jar it jars alright but when i test log in.. it says "error connecting to server" ? can anyone help o.o?

item.title: Screenshots?
item.dc:creator: @jSherz jSherz
item.description:
@jSherz wrote:

Do do this you would have to find:

  1. How to de-compile, edit and then re-compile a client.
  2. Get Java to produce a screenshot.
  3. Get Java to then save the screenshot.

Try “Googling” these but this sounds quite a difficult task.

Read full topic

item.title: Screenshots?
item.dc:creator: @supamagier supamagier
item.description:
@supamagier wrote:

I’m not posting random stuff. That is how it works. Don’t ask me how to implement that in a private server, because I know shit about that. I could make something that does it btw, just not in private servers… Google it or something, or get some crazy guy to make it for you.

item.title: Screenshots?
item.dc:creator: @supamagier supamagier
item.description:
@supamagier wrote:

It’s not that hard gunz4life. In the actionperformed of the button you’re using just copy the screen using the Image class and use ImageIO to save it to a file. No… I’m not gonna explain how to do this. Google it.
